description: At all times during the life of the impounding works authorised by this licence, whichever is the lesser of <flow> litres flow per second or the natural flow in the <watercourse> immediately upstream of the impounding works shall pass downstream of the impounding works undiminished in quantity or quality. This shall be achieved by means of the <Impoundment features e.g. culvert, hydro-break control device, penstock and spillway> detailed in condition(s) xx and shown in the drawing number xx attached to this licence.
